title: A Unified Theorem of the Alternative. (arXiv:2303.07471v1 [econ.TH])
abstract: This note presents a unified theorem of the alternative that explicitly allows for any combination of equality, componentwise inequality, weak dominance, strict dominance, and nonnegativity relations. The theorem nests 60 special cases, some of which have been stated as separate theorems.
context:
Title: A Unified Theorem of the Alternative. (arXiv:2303.07471v1 [econ.TH])
Abstract: This note presents a unified theorem of the alternative that explicitly allows for any combination of equality, componentwise inequality, weak dominance, strict dominance, and nonnegativity relations. The theorem nests 60 special cases, some of which have been stated as separate theorems.
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一个统一的备选定理，它明确允许任何组合的相等性、分量不等式、弱优、严格优以及非负性关系。该定理嵌套了 60 个特殊情况，其中一些已经被阐述为单独的定理。
tldr: 本文提出了一个统一的备选定理，它嵌套了 60 个特殊情况，明确允许任何组合的相等性、分量不等式、弱优、严格优以及非负性关系。
